translated: Other episodes [edit | change the wikicode] The series includes five episodes: The Legends of Zelda, The Adventure of Link, A Link to the Past, Link's Awakening, Ocarina of Time, Majora's Mask, Oracle of Ages, Oracle of Seasons, The Wind Waker, Four Swords Ad.
original: Autres épisodes de la série [modifier | modifier le wikicode] La série comprend quinze épisodes : The Legends of Zelda, The Adventure of Link, A Link to the Past, Link's Awakening, Ocarina of Time, Majora's Mask, Oracle of Age, Oracle of Seasons, The Wind Waker, Four Swords Ad.
loc: https://fr.vikidia.org/wiki/The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
